1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: Xiao Ping Jing is worried about his brother as conflict brews at the northern frontier.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: The Changlin Army tries to figure out what Great Yu might be planning.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: Now that an investigation is under way, those responsible for the sinking of the supply ships must make sure that nothing leads back to them.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: Now that they have found a witness and some evidence, they have to figure out how to get back to the capital alive.

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: Song Fu has been sentenced. Ping Jing and his brother come up with a theory even though they are not supposed to interfere with the trial.

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: It seems that the escaped criminal has disappeared into the inner quarters. Lin Xi thinks she has figured out why Princess Consort has been unable to have a child.

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot: Ping Jing and Lin Xi discuss reversing the effects of the Eastern Sea Dracaena. Song Fu explains his reasons for his actions.

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: Grand Madam of Laiyang's motives are revealed. The impending visit from Eastern Sea State seems suspicious.

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: Grand Madam of Laiyang's motives are revealed. The impending visit from Eastern Sea State seems suspicious.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: The search for the truth about Consort Shu's death continues. The Guru aligns himself with Marquis Mo Zi.

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: Ping Jing and Ping Zhang try to figure out what happened to Grand Madam of Laiyang. Yuan Qi asks Ping Jing for help.

13.title: Episode #2.13
13.plot: Ping Jing feels responsible for Qian Xue's condition and asks to hide out with Lin Xi for a while. Is Mo Zi still in the capital?

14.title: Episode #2.14
14.plot: Yuan Qi is asked to choose between giving his mother a proper burial and his place in the palace. Ping Zhang speaks up about the proposed treaty with Northern Yan.

15.title: Episode #2.15
15.plot: Guru's trap is set. Phing Zhang rushes to Ping Jing's rescue.

16.title: Episode #2.16
16.plot: Guru tries to find out what happened. Yuan Qi asks Guru about his next step.

17.title: Episode #2.17
17.plot: Chong Hua shows off her fighting skills and a friendly match takes a lethal turn.

18.title: Episode #2.18
18.plot: Ping Zhang tries to show Tuoba the truth about what happened at the banquet. Guru and Master Xun discuss a long-term plan.

19.title: Episode #2.19
19.plot: Guru uses the fire to further his plan. The empress agrees to sacrifice thousands of commoners in order to save her son.

20.title: Episode #2.20
20.plot: As the virus spreads, the medical clinic is overrun. Guru makes final preparations and then leaves the capital.

21.title: Episode #2.21
21.plot: Yuan Qi finally realizes what Guru has been planning. Ping Zhang asks Qian Xue to help find a cure.

22.title: Episode #2.22
22.plot: Now that they know what ingredient they were missing, they have to figure out how to secure enough of it for everyone.

23.title: Episode #2.23
23.plot: The tattoo makes it easier to ferret out Guru's accomplices. Old Hall Master Li explains the significance of the tattoo.

24.title: Episode #2.24
24.plot: Guru forces the hand of one of his disciples. Ping Zhang is determined to save his brother.

25.title: Episode #2.25
25.plot: Ping Zhang and Yuan Qi continue to look for the cave where they believe Guru is hiding. Old Hall Master Li and Lin Xi keep looking for a cure.

26.title: Episode #2.26
26.plot: Old Hall Master Li and Lin Xi think they may have found a way to save both men. Tuoba Yu warns Ping Zhang about a secret treaty.

27.title: Episode #2.27
27.plot: Ping Jing and Yuan Qi set out to help Ping Zhang.

28.title: Episode #2.28
28.plot: Qian Xue agrees to go to Langya Hall to recuperate. Everyone is worried about the emperor's health.

29.title: Episode #2.29
29.plot: Ping Jing returns to the capital. His father is excited to hear news from the northern frontier.

30.title: Episode #2.30
30.plot: Empress Dowager takes on Ting Sheng in the Imperial Court. Ping Jing heads back to the northern frontier.

31.title: Episode #2.31
31.plot: Ping Jing has to prove himself at the frontier. Ping Jing and Lin Xi are surprised when their paths cross again.

32.title: Episode #2.32
32.plot: Ruan Ying tries to convince Qin Ling Shuo to listen to his military strategy. Ping Jing entrusts an important task to Yuan Qi.

33.title: Episode #2.33
33.plot: Yuan Qi forges an alliance with Master Xun. The emperor continues to be manipulated by his mother and uncle.

34.title: Episode #2.34
34.plot: Ping Jing can tell that someone has tampered with the letter, so he exercises extreme caution when discussing his next military action.

35.title: Episode #2.35
35.plot: Master Xun confronts Ping Jing. Lin Xi seeks advice from Old Hall Master Lin.

36.title: Episode #2.36
36.plot: Prince of Changlin accompanies Ping Jing to the Imperial Court to explain to the emperor why the royal decree was not obeyed.

37.title: Episode #2.37
37.plot: Ping Jing tries to come to terms with his father's illness. The emperor must learn to rule alone.

38.title: Episode #2.38
38.plot: Ping Jing sets off to start a new chapter in his life.

39.title: Episode #2.39
39.plot: Empress Dowager comes to accept Yuan Qi's marriage to An Ru. Jin Ping finds out what has been happening while he has been gone.

40.title: Episode #2.40
40.plot: Once Ping Jing starts to investigate, he sees right through Yuan Qi's battle plan. He is not the only one questioning the battle.

41.title: Episode #2.41
41.plot: Yuan Qi convinces the emperor to let him go see Ping Jing on the emperor's behalf.

42.title: Episode #2.42
42.plot: An Ru has trouble believing what Pei has to say. Yuan Qi is offered another proposal.

43.title: Episode #2.43
43.plot: General Yue convinces the emperor to look into the Eastern Sea State's motives, and has to decide if he is going to believe the word of a maid.

44.title: Episode #2.44
44.plot: An Ru's aunt is suspicious of the circumstances surrounding Pei's accident. Yuan Qi makes a bold move.

45.title: Episode #2.45
45.plot: Madam Qi's hiding place may not be as secure as she and Yuan Qi think.

46.title: Episode #2.46
46.plot: Empress Dowager asks her son to make a decree that inadvertently puts a kink in Yuan Qi's plan.

47.title: Episode #2.47
47.plot: General Yue and Master Jin rush to try to protect the emperor. Empress Dowager makes an unexpected move.

48.title: Episode #2.48
48.plot: Ping Jing surprises Yuan Qi. Will he be able to save the emperor?

49.title: Episode #2.49
49.plot: Di Ming tells the emperor why he sided with Yuan Qi. General Xun makes a sacrifice.

50.title: Episode #2.50
50.plot: In the series finale, Jing Ping confronts Yuan Qi. Who will prevail?

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Xie Yu comes up with a plan to have Yue reinstated as Noble Consort. A debate on rites is held among Confucian scholars.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Princess Ni Huang's suspicions about Chang Su's identity grow stronger. A gunpowder smuggling scheme goes awry in the capital.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: A shipment of tangerines exposes a plot from an unlikely source. More evidence comes up about the fireworks factory, but not enough to shut it down.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: The plan to help Minister He's son escape prison fails. Yu Jin makes progress with his relationship with his father.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: The emperor tasks Xia Dong and Xia Chun with investigating the New Year's Eve murder case, while Chang Su looks into it on his own.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Chang Su sends a skilled swordsman to the capital to take on Xie Yu's men. The anticipated Lantern Festival arrives.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Jing Rui confronts Xie Yu about Qing Yao's injury. Ban Ruo advises Prince Yu to make the best of the fireworks factory case.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Chang Su convinces Princess Ni Huang and Commander Meng to back Prince Jing. Minister He's son's case throws the Ministries of Justice and Personnel into shambles.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Envoys from Southern Chu arrive in the capital. The emperor decides to send Princess Ni Huang back to Yunnan.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Jing Rui's birthday party is interrupted with a challenge and a revelation that will sever ties between the Xie and Zhuo families.

locations: Hengdian World Studios, Heng Dian, China
Ningbo Xiangshan Motion Picture City, Xiangshan, Zhejiang, China
imdb.plot outline: During the 4th century, war broke out between the feudal Northern Wei dynasty and Southern Liang dynasties, leading Liang's General Lin Xie to take his only child, the 19 year old Lin Shu, to battle. Unexpectedly, Lin Xie was framed by a political rival, causing the unjust deaths of seventy thousand Chiyan army soldiers, just after they drove off the hostile Wei forces. After barely escaping with his life, Lin Shu establishes the Jiangzuo Alliance with the help of Langya Hall and makes a name for himself as Mei Changsu, chief of the pugilistic world. Under the alias of Su Zhe, he returns to the capital of Liang 12 years on to overturn the injustices imposed on the Chiyan Army and secretly assist his friend the unfavored Prince Xiao Jingyan in his battle for the throne.
imdb.title: Nirvana in Fire
plot: Story about a son's search for his family's lost honor.

During the 4th century, war broke out between the feudal Northern Wei dynasty and Southern Liang dynasties, leading Liang's General Lin Xie to take his only child, the 19 year old Lin Shu, to battle. Unexpectedly, Lin Xie was framed by a political rival, causing the unjust deaths of seventy thousand Chiyan army soldiers, just after they drove off the hostile Wei forces. After barely escaping with his life, Lin Shu establishes the Jiangzuo Alliance with the help of Langya Hall and makes a name for himself as Mei Changsu, chief of the pugilistic world. Under the alias of Su Zhe, he returns to the capital of Liang 12 years on to overturn the injustices imposed on the Chiyan Army and secretly assist his friend the unfavored Prince Xiao Jingyan in his battle for the throne.
